tools.name: get_current_stock_quote
tools.description: Get current stock quote for a symbol including price, volume, and basic metrics. Data is delayed up to 15 minutes

outputSchema.description: Current stock quote data with clean keys

tools.name: get_stock_time_series
tools.description: Retrieve historical stock price data and trading volumes over various time periods including minute-by-minute, daily, weekly, and monthly intervals with optional dividend adjustments

interval.description: Data frequency: minute intervals (1min-60min) for intraday, or daily/weekly/monthly

adjusted.description: Apply dividend/split adjustments for accurate historical comparisons

month.description: Target month for intraday data in YYYY-MM format (e.g., '2024-03')

extended_hours.description: Include pre-market and after-hours trading data

outputSchema.description: Time series data with clean keys

last_refreshed.description: Last data refresh time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format)

items.description: Time series data sorted from earliest to latest date

tools.name: lookup_stock_symbol
tools.description: Search for stock symbols and company names using keywords

keywords.description: Search keywords for company name or symbol

outputSchema.description: Search results for stocks with clean keys

tools.name: get_global_markets_status
tools.description: Get current status for all major global stock exchanges and cryptocurrency markets

outputSchema.description: Status information for multiple global markets and exchanges

tools.name: get_historical_options
tools.description: Retrieve historical options trading data including calls and puts for a specific stock symbol and expiration date

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch historical options data for

date.description: Date for historical options data (YYYY-MM-DD format)

outputSchema.description: Historical options data for the specified symbol and date

date.description: Date of the options data (YYYY-MM-DD format)

tools.name: get_top_gainers_losers
tools.description: Get top gaining stocks, top losing stocks, and most actively traded stocks

outputSchema.description: Top gainers, losers, and most actively traded stocks

tools.name: get_news_sentiment
tools.description: Get news sentiment analysis for specific stock tickers. Always returns exactly 10 articles

tickers.description: List of stock tickers for news sentiment analysis

start_time.description: Start time for news analysis (YYYYMMDDTHHMM format)

end_time.description: End time for news analysis (YYYYMMDDTHHMM format)

outputSchema.description: News sentiment analysis data for specified tickers

feed.description: Array of news articles with sentiment analysis (exactly 10 articles)

tools.name: get_stock_insider_transactions
tools.description: Get insider trading transactions for a specific stock symbol

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch insider transactions for

outputSchema.description: Insider trading transactions data

relationship.description: Relationship to the company (e.g., CEO, Director, Officer)

last_price.description: Price per share of the transaction

tools.name: analyze_stocks
tools.description: Perform advanced analytics on stock price data

symbols.description: List of ticker symbols to analyze (e.g., ["AAPL","MSFT"]).

series_range.description: Date/time span of the series. Use 'full', relative like '30day'/'12month'/'2year' (and for intraday: '45minute'/'6hour'), or absolute dates: 'YYYY-MM-DD' (1 day), 'YYYY-MM' (full month), 'YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SS'. For a custom start/end, pass this key twice.

ohlc.description: Which OHLC field to compute on.

calculations.description: Analytics to compute. Use plain names or parameterized forms.

window_size.description: Sliding window length (data points). Omit or set null for fixed-window over the entire range. If provided, must be >= 10.

outputSchema.description: Analytics results. Fixed-window returns one set per symbol (plus matrices where applicable). Sliding-window returns series per symbol.

date.description: Date or timestamp for the calculation (YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format)

tools.name: get_symbol_overview
tools.description: Get comprehensive overview information for a stock symbol or ETF including key metrics, description, and fundamental data

symbol.description: The stock/ETF symbol to fetch profile for

outputSchema.description: Company or ETF profile data

diluted_eps_ttm.description: Diluted earnings per share (trailing twelve months)

tools.name: get_financial_statements
tools.description: Get financial statements for a company including income statement, balance sheet, and cash flow data with key financial metrics and ratios

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch financial statements for

statement_type.description: Type of financial statement to fetch

outputSchema.description: Financial statement data for the requested type(s)

tools.name: get_earning_data
tools.description: Get comprehensive earnings data for a stock symbol including both annual and quarterly earnings history with EPS, estimates, and surprises

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch earnings data for

quarter.description: Optional specific quarter to focus on (e.g., '2024-Q1', '2023-Q4'). If not provided, returns all available earnings data.

outputSchema.description: Company earnings data including annual and quarterly earnings history

reported_date.description: Date when earnings were reported (YYYY-MM-DD format)

tools.name: get_corporate_actions
tools.description: Retrieve comprehensive corporate actions history including dividend payments and stock splits for a given stock symbol

symbol.description: The stock symbol to fetch corporate actions for

outputSchema.description: Complete corporate actions data including both dividends and stock splits

tools.name: get_market_calendar
tools.description: Retrieve upcoming earnings announcements with optional IPO calendar data for market planning and analysis

symbol.description: Stock symbol for earnings calendar (optional, if not provided returns all upcoming earnings)

with_ipos.description: Include IPO calendar data in addition to earnings calendar

outputSchema.description: Structured market calendar data

symbol.description: Symbol for earnings calendar (only present if provided in input)

ipos.description: Upcoming IPO announcements (only included if with_ipos is true)

tools.name: get_listing_status
tools.description: Retrieve current listing status information for stocks on US exchanges including active and delisted securities

date.description: Date for listing status (YYYY-MM-DD format, optional)

state.description: Listing status state to filter by

outputSchema.description: Structured listing status data for US exchange stocks

date.description: Date for the listing status query (if provided)

tools.name: get_current_fx_rate
tools.description: Retrieve the current real-time exchange rate between two currencies with bid/ask pricing information

outputSchema.description: Real-time currency exchange rate data

tools.name: get_fx_time_series
tools.description: Retrieve historical foreign exchange time series data with multiple interval options including intraday, daily, weekly, and monthly periods

outputSchema.description: FX time series data for the specified interval

last_refreshed.description: Last data refresh time (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format)

items.description: Time series FX data sorted from earliest to latest date

tools.name: get_current_crypto_quote
tools.description: Retrieve the current market quote for a cryptocurrency including latest price, volume, and market data

outputSchema.description: Current cryptocurrency market quote with normalized data

last_refreshed.description: Last data refresh timestamp (YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS format)

tools.name: get_crypto_time_series
tools.description: Retrieve historical cryptocurrency price data and trading volumes over various time periods including minute-by-minute, daily, weekly, and monthly intervals

outputSchema.description: Historical cryptocurrency time series data with structured OHLCV pricing

metadata.description: Metadata about the cryptocurrency time series

items.description: Time series cryptocurrency data sorted from earliest to latest date

tools.name: get_commodities
tools.description: Get global commodities data including oil, metals, and agricultural products

outputSchema.description: Global commodities data

tools.name: get_growth_metrics
tools.description: Real GDP and real GDP per capita

seasonally_adjusted.description: Whether to use seasonally adjusted data

outputSchema.description: Growth metrics data including GDP and GDP per capita

tools.name: get_rates_yields
tools.description: Treasury yields curve and federal funds rate, with optional target range

include_target_range.description: Include federal funds rate target range

outputSchema.description: Interest rates and treasury yields data

data.description: Array of rates and yields data

tools.name: get_prices_inflation
tools.description: CPI index and inflation rate, with optional core variants

include_core.description: Include core CPI (excluding food and energy)

seasonally_adjusted.description: Whether to use seasonally adjusted data

outputSchema.description: Consumer price index and inflation data

data.description: Array of price and inflation data

tools.name: get_labor_activity
tools.description: Unemployment and nonfarm payrolls, with optional retail sales and durables

include_demand.description: Include retail sales and durables data

seasonally_adjusted.description: Whether to use seasonally adjusted data

outputSchema.description: Labor market and economic activity data

data.description: Array of labor and activity data

tools.name: get_trend_indicators
tools.description: Trend pack: SMA, EMA, WMA, MACD. Uses a global preset to set sensible defaults

outputSchema.description: Trend indicators data with all indicators in the pack

timestamp.description: Date/time of the data point (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

tools.name: get_momentum_indicators
tools.description: Momentum pack: RSI, STOCH, CCI, MFI. Global preset sets all defaults

outputSchema.description: Momentum indicators data with all indicators in the pack

timestamp.description: Date/time of the data point (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

tools.name: get_volatility_indicators
tools.description: Volatility pack: BBANDS, ATR, SAR. Global preset sets all defaults

outputSchema.description: Volatility indicators data with all indicators in the pack

timestamp.description: Date/time of the data point (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

tools.name: get_volume_indicators
tools.description: Volume/flow pack: OBV, AD, ADOSC. Global preset sets all defaults

outputSchema.description: Volume indicators data with all indicators in the pack

timestamp.description: Date/time of the data point (format: YYYY-MM-DD HH:MM:SS)

component.description: Value component: usually 'value'; provider may add more components
